lenders.name: marivic
lenders.loan_because: i want to start my restaurant business because i want to utilize my talent and gift for cooking.  Likewise, i want to help people by employing them so that they can have a better life by  sending  their children to school.  It will also help my brother and sister who are not employed at the moment and i believe that they are the best people that can help me establish my dream business .  I have two children and my youngest will be entering college this June 2008.  I want to help my husband to be able to send our children to good school.  We cannot do this if we will rely solely on our monthly salary that is why I want to start my own business.  This will also a good way to train my children on how to become an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently working as a Protocol Officer in the House of Representatives but i do catering business too.  I am a good cook and i want to focus more on my catering business.  At present, my business is a one-woman-army since i do everything from planning to marketing and cooking. If i have big catering contract, i hired 3 to 5 housewives to be able to help them to augment their husbands' salaries.

lenders.name: Raquel

lenders.name: Jim & Susan

I believe that my borrowers will succeed if they are given a chance.  

God has blessed me, so I should bless others.

lenders.name: Cory and Chris

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.occupation: Founder and Executive Director of a non-profit

lenders.occupational_info: I made it my life's mission to bring comfort and love to impoverished, orphaned and abused children around the world. Whether it's giving hugs, toys, clothes or food; I live to serve and be the voice for those who are hurting.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: how can I not?

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: my life is so blessed that I can...and I admire all people who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.occupational_info: right now im a student studying in london, but I help run my families farm raising alpacas for wool and show animals and will take over this business when the time comes.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I worked and traveled in Latin America and saw first hand what even a few resources can do to significantly change a persons's -- and a family's -- standard of living. I also learned a lot about myself, not the least of which is that by giving even a little, I get so much in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I write user guides for computer software. I also write about movies, especially horror movies. You can check out my page on Squidoo where a lot of my articles are published. And if you buy any of the movies, a portion of the proceeds goes to Kiva!

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a hand up not a hand out.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for all that God has given me.  I really wanted to give something back.  I know what it is like to be poor, have children at home and no real skills.  Back in 1997 a special person gave me a leg up and helped me become a realtor and develop my 'inner saleswoman'!  I am happy to say because of this person's generosity that I am a leader in my field and have the comforts that success and income can bring.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who rent homes become homeowners.  I also help people who own homes, sell them.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to, and I want to share that with others.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe capitalism is the best way to get ahead.  I am willing to support those who want to accept the risks and the rewards.

lenders.name: Marlee
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is the best way to give others a chance to bring themselves and their families out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at U of Hawaii at Manoa, I also volunteer in a biomedical research lab and hope to soon be pursuing my Ph.D..

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I believe the ability to pursue happiness is a basic human right. If I can help others improve their lives by making loans to them, then I will do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise money for a school by writing news articles, letters, and internet posts about the school's students, teachers, and alumni. Writing these articles helps convince people who have the means to do so give money to the school for financial aid, new buildings, good teachers, and more.

lenders.name: Delma
lenders.loan_because: Even though I live in the US, I know what it is like to be homeless and without funds for even the most basic needs.  I would like to help other women to rise above poverty and be able to take care of themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to drive a school bus.  I would pick the chiden up at their homes and drive them to school and then when school was over, I would pick them up and drive them back home.

lenders.name: Scott and Tina
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is a great thing to do to play one's good fortunes forward to others who are less fortunate. The spirit of another human being and the earth are the greatest things to which any one can contribute.
lenders.occupational_info: I stock fruits and vegetables at a grocery store. My wife cares for our two children. I am also a artist and writer in my spare time. My wife is working on crafting some Tiny Traveling Teddy (small Teddy Bears).

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can help people achieve the goals they want to pursue.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good - pretty selfish, huh?

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me more than I could ever deserve, and I want to share that blessing with others.

lenders.occupational_info: go to school 6 hours ,come home do homework,play sports,play video games and then go to bed

lenders.name: Mary Jane
lenders.loan_because: I believe that every person who is willing to work deserves a chance to succeed. I have been helped by others in my life, and I feel responsible for helping someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books, short stories, and articles. I make my living by writing for companies--brochures, web sites, and feature articles. One of the characters in the book that I am writing now is from Ethiopia and I feel a connection through him to Africa although I have never been there.

lenders.name: tricia
lenders.loan_because: Because those who have the resources should help those who don't.  I am very lucky to be able to provide for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce TV commercials for a living

lenders.name: Susan B
lenders.loan_because: I am happy in life.  I hope to teach my grandchild, Katie, be do the same.  There is nothing like being able to help another.  I want this to follow me after I leave this world and travel somewhere exciting.  Being able to assist those less fortunate is what we are supposed to do.  To me, it is a privilage to be able to help.  I do not have extended wealth, I am middle America. Twenty five extra dollars or twenty five million, it doesn't matter, it is our duty to help when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint, design clothing, make jelwery, grandmother to death! , My wonderful husband, Ron, and I travel and just have fun.  With amost everything I do has something to do with the arts . I am President of a Local Union for IATSE wardrobe, which means I work with professional personalities and assist them during their performances with their clothing.  I have been with the theatre for almost 40 years  and during that time have worked with some great actors and great people..I just want to help those who want to improve their lives and the lives of their families.  I have been blessed over they years with a wonderful life and family..Kiva is one small way of paying back..GOOD luck to all..

lenders.loan_because: i very much like this initiative!

lenders.name: Hilary

lenders.occupational_info: We run a small foundation that provides comfort and aid to cancer patients and their families.

lenders.name: Marek
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to improve the life... to give a "hook to hunt a lot of fishes" instead "a single fish to instant eat". i was lucky to be born in Europe... and i want to help people who dont have such a chance  to earn money as i have..... good luck ... Enterpreneurs... World will be YOURS :))
lenders.occupational_info: Im a medicine docor and cure back problems. means im chiropractor. many of my patients are wealthy... i charge good money from them.. and other my patients are poor... from them i take no money. no mater if they rrich or poor i treat their back problems the best i can.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. - John D. Rockefeller Jr.

lenders.name: Francoise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Evidently
lenders.loan_because: Our company charity of choice. Looking to make a real difference to real people.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because:
To live in a privileged world by a chance of birth and do nothing for those who do not or will not have the same opportunities/advantages by that same chance of birth is the same as condemning those persons to the slightest turning of the winds. Tragedies both personal and collective can sometimes be avoided or lessened by a little help here and there, so why not just try?

"We want moral progress to burst up from below, rather than waiting patiently upon condescension from the top." --Richard Rorty ("Human Rights, Rationality and Sentimentality," 1993)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student earning my bachelors degree in International Conflict Studies so that one day we may better prevent conflict without having to start a "preventative war". I also work part time in as a sales person in two shops.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: If you are able to help you should help.

lenders.name: Gail

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I hope it helps

lenders.name: Noah

lenders.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old. I play with Legos and it's fun. My favorite food is not pizza, it's quesadillas and fish tacos. I have one 6 year old brother and a really cute baby brother.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to create the life they want

lenders.name: The Bakhshi Family
lenders.loan_because:
"The bread in your cupboard belongs to the hungry man; the coat hanging unused in your closet belongs to the man who needs it; the shoes rotting in your closet belong to the man who has none; the money which you hoard in the bank belongs to the poor. You do wrong to everyone you could help, but fail to help." St. Basil the Great

I hope participating in these types of experiences will help to instill a strong value in my children which will be upheld long after me.

lenders.name: Eve Reinhardt
lenders.occupational_info: Documentary production.  Economic Development and Public Health studies

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets us practice what Margaret Mead observed, "Never doubt a small group of committed [in this case global] citizens can change the world... Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has." Join in and make some change.
lenders.occupational_info: In work and in life, I aim to make economies and communities work better for more people -- while making new friends, learning new things, and finding new sources of wonder along the way.

lenders.name: Phoenix
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Frances and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy and rewarding.  I can't think of a better use of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: What comes around, goes around.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I operate an Electrical Contracting business, as well as a Sheep farm and a Gift Basket business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful program and is changing lives everyday.  I feel honored to be part of this program and will continue to give as long as there are people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a seasonal Firefighter then I got into HVAC.  I have a bone disease that is slowly robbing me of the ability to walk.  BUT, I have so much more than most of the people on here looking for loans that I feel a little obligated to help where I can !!

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is the main source of strife in the world. Resisting poverty is promoting peace.

lenders.name: lee
lenders.loan_because: it's important.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in entrepreneurs with good ideas and high growth opportunities.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: Do good, come what may.

lenders.name: Amber & David
lenders.loan_because: We want to touch people's lives in a positive way and share God's love and blessings with the world.  There is no better investment than people.
lenders.occupational_info: We build businesses and invest in assets that generate income, so we don't have to work for money.  This enables us to live and work anywhere in the world and spend time on what matters to us (people and relationships).

lenders.name: Tally
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit

lenders.name: Nickola for Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have too much while so many have too little.  We must share our good fortune so that someday all people may be truly equal.  Michael passed away on Feb. 15, but  will continue to loan in his name.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design electronics equipment for large satellite systems.

I am a retired elementary teacher, who now teaches teachers.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have had an enormous amount of opportunity throughout my life, and I think everyone should be afforded the same chances.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in rehabilitation at a large hospital.  My patients are recovering from orthopedic surgeries and other events such as stroke, spinal cord injuries, etc.

lenders.name: Fritz Family
lenders.loan_because: I think that programs like this are real positive forces in the world, both economically and socially.  Having the ability to impact someone's life so greatly with so little is very humbling and rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: General Manager of a Global Mobility organization.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: How can you not do your part to help others who want to improve their lives and our world?

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: people need help.

lenders.name: Lisamarie
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people, especially those who are trying to help themselves.  Everyone needs a hand at some point in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in education.

lenders.name: The Crenshaws
lenders.loan_because: As business owners, we understand  the risk and rewards of starting your own business.  And more importantly, how  access to capital can impact not only a family, but an entire community.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help companies reach their corpoate goals through the use of promotional marketing, printing and branding programs. 

She runs a search firm in the healthcare IT industry.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Loans make people independent instead of dependent on charity.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I find it very interesting.
lenders.occupational_info: I import goods from China and travel there often.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together, so we must take care of each other. Many have helped me along the way, and continue to do so, therfore, I am deeply humbled and honored for the privelage in keeping the "goodness" moving! Amen
lenders.occupational_info: Just try to help people as much as I'm able to.

lenders.name: L. Del Carmen_UnA
lenders.loan_because:
I'm also a small business owner & I'm aware of how difficult it is to get started. Also helping others  it's satisfying enough..
Yo tambien empeze mi negocio & se lo dificil que puede ser. Tambien poder ayudar a las personas en algo, aunque sea con poco es una gran satisfaccion.
lenders.occupational_info: I do floral work for Weddings & Corporate Events. I'm also a full time Horticulturist, doing indoor plantscaping in New York City.

lenders.name: The Tomato Boys
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our profits with other entrepreneurs in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We are 3 brothers who run a tomato stand outside of our California home.

lenders.name: Bela & Cherry Bodey
lenders.loan_because: People have helped us in the past and now its our turn.

lenders.name: A & A plus T
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams! Never loose hope!
lenders.occupational_info: We have been working side by side for 21 years. We have created a business from the ground up to support our family and others. Giving back to our community is always on our minds. Helping others help themselves always gives us a warm and fussy feeling inside. Good All over!

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: Every little thing makes a difference.

lenders.name: Fernando
lenders.loan_because: It is time to stop the endless talk and start to act. People need help now and together we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for hiring, training and developing people. One of my main challenges is to attract and retain high potential professionals. At the end of the day I work with people!

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower others to make a better life for themselves.  I believe a small amount goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Sales Director at an online advertising network. I assist organizations with their online marketing initiatives.

lenders.name: FRC SIFE
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish feed him for a day; Teach a man to fish feed him for life
lenders.occupational_info: College students that want to change the world though empowering others

lenders.name: JOANNA
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful gift Kiva has given to make it possible to easily give directly to people to give them an opprotunity to create their own success.  we are lucky to have been born into a life of great opportunity and fortune as most have little access to opportunities that we have.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a wife, mother, volunteer, entrepreneur and film & visual effects producer .

lenders.name: KLo
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom with 2 little boys and a loving husband.

lenders.name: Jeff & MB
lenders.loan_because: We learned about Micro Loans through the book, "Banker to the Poor" by Muhammad Yunas.  We wanted to be part of the miracle of empowering people to bring themselves to the next step on a road to financial security.
lenders.occupational_info: Student / Accountant

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best ways to help my family throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Member of the Baha'i Faith and we believe that all people are a part of one family: the Human Family.

lenders.name: M and N
lenders.occupation: Electrical contracting and Internet business owner
lenders.loan_because: We think we are all in this world to share and to progress.  If we progress why shouldn't you?  Let the good things spread around!
lenders.occupational_info: We are entrepreneurs, just like the people here borrowing.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to put money to work, so I can earn money and help other people with creditablity., and I would like to have money loaned to me in times I need money. We help each other in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on California Landlord & tennant, California Traffic cases,  U.S. Immigration cases, Tort claims, Breach of contracts claims, Property damage, business disputes. I type up pleadings and motions in these California cases.

lenders.name: Charles and Mary Ella
lenders.loan_because: If God sent his Son to die for my sins, surely I can send a few dollars to help out his other children!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Marketplace Chaplain in South Georgia and my wife and I are Navajo Missionaries in Arizona.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world of ours, what better way than to help those who are trying to better themselves and the communities they live in.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: When I showed my 13 year old daughter the very first  Entrepreneur, she exclaimed, "What a wonderful program!  Let's give them the rest of the loan."

lenders.name: Øyvind
lenders.loan_because: Because it helps other people around the world to get a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Fun and entertaining.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make life better and happier for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I make art images on the computer for companies to advertise their products.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: you guys deserve the help because you are making something out of yourselves and i know you are putting the money to good use ... best of luck
lenders.occupational_info: i help take sick or injured people to the hospital in an ambulance... also i work at a carwash =)

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I supply clean needles to illicit drug users in order to help slow the spread of HIV and Hepatitis C.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I could not have been successful in my life without loans. The credit I have received has empowered me immensely. I think everyone should have access to this powerful tool. I hope that the people I lend to become so successful that they can help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and raise money for service organizations (NGOs). I like to help organizations overcome problems and become more efficient. I also sometimes work with small businesses to help improve their marketing efforts.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: paying it forward is as important as paying it back.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Assisting others to help themselves through a loan is much better than a charitable handout. Self reliance through financial independence is much better for the soul than a life of desperate dependence.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain a number of residential rental property buildings. The cleaning and gardening of common areas, general maintenance services, garbage and recycling removal, painting and the co-ordination of any plumbing and electrical work.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the blessings God gives me.
lenders.occupational_info: Database conversions.

lenders.name: mungo
lenders.loan_because: Small changes have big effects.
lenders.occupational_info: I have long conversations with a glowing box.

lenders.name: Abduljaman
lenders.loan_because: to sustain my consultancy firm in order to serve fellow being and the world. Without honest and sustainable incomes, all my short write-up will cut-off from the scene.
lenders.occupational_info: Indeed is a rare someone who care the world without being molded to righteousness. In my entire life all my short write-up to the world will justify to love and cares humanity irregardless who they are: I really against all kinds of violence motives in this world. Life is so precious created by God with purpose need not to sacrifice by other fellow being with the same creation.

lenders.name: andreia
lenders.loan_because: Gostaria de investir no pequeno escritorio que tenho em minha casa,moveis como escrivaninha,cadeira,arquivo,etc.
lenders.occupational_info: Serviços contabeis para empresas,autonomos, entidades sociais. Area fiscal,trabalhista,etc.

lenders.name: Ayeshya
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others in any way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for babies that are born to early.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a small hand to get on their feet and make a big difference in their lives and their families lives

lenders.name: Georges
lenders.loan_because: It's a concrete way to help others. It feels like you are making a little bit of difference in the world.

lenders.name: Camerali Uniti
lenders.occupation: Group of friends from Chamber of Commerce of Prato

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help people and I would want someone to help me if I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I was an electrician who worked in New York City.  I got hurt at work and am now retired.  I volunteer for a charity called Rock and Wrap It Up!. We recover food, that was prepared but not served, from sporting events, film productions, hotels, concerts and caterers.

lenders.name: Øyvind Aasbrenn
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a chance

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it works

lenders.name: tito harris
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help others help themselves...
lenders.occupational_info: I help managers to get the best from their people by challenging their own view of the world and their motivation to become a manager in the first place...

lenders.name: Lucky Family
lenders.loan_because: Because we are lucky enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: Financial manager, attorney mom and great kids.

lenders.name: Jo
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people become self-sufficient without the banksters profiting.
lenders.occupational_info: Software and equipment testing

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have a strong belief in giving people a hand and NOT a hand out
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mortgage lending classes in the State of North Carolina, U.S.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.occupation: Student at Virginia Tech in Virginia, USA

lenders.name: TIM
lenders.loan_because:
i was invited to. 
A simple yet brilliantly effective way to help and I'm chuffed to be involved.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness develop the skills they need to live safely and happily in the community.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate and wish the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I support the work of others.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: "Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm. As you get older, remember you have another hand: the first is to help yourself, the second is to help others."  ~ Audrey Hepburn
lenders.occupational_info: I write technical manuals and documentation for software systems.

lenders.name: Stéphanie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have, I want to share a little!

sounds come out and are documented

please visit the ContrailsOverBoston

http://tinyurl.com/273n64x

Kiva allows me to help others, learn about the world, and save money.

My parents set this up for me. It's like a savings account that earns karma instead of interest.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a kid.

lenders.name: Joe Grabol
lenders.loan_because: To give some thing back.
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: M.S.
lenders.loan_because: Because sharing a little of what I have, hopefully will make a very big difference in another person's life.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.occupational_info: Oil field worker in the middleeast.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and new technology in a healthcare setting

lenders.name: Ben Parizek

lenders.name: john

lenders.occupational_info: i am an accounting teacher

lenders.name: Chelle
lenders.loan_because: The ripple effect - by helping one we help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit hospice

lenders.loan_because: Education is the way for evolution.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly.

lenders.name: Melissa, Matt, Max, Asia
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: take care of sick people & write stories

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help each other out !  Many people have helped me throughout my life -- sometimes with information, other times with material needs.  I like to do the same when & where I can !
lenders.occupational_info: Database programmer -- I sit in an office all day and program computers, also deal with a lot of people.  It pays the bills, nothing exciting.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It's fun, it's useful, and it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people with health problems stay at home.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I like to assist people improve their lot in life.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I believe people can bring about change if they make the effort.

lenders.name: Reuven
lenders.loan_because: Together we can do all those things we cannot do alone.
lenders.occupational_info: I help technology companies grow.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it is important for us to help one another in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Human Services with a minor in Women's and Gender Studies.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: The return on investments through Kiva comes in the form of helping people help themselves.  There is no greater return on an investment in my opinion!
